Speaker: speaker1
Response: Isn't this lovely weather ? Will you help me water the flowers , Jack ?

Speaker: speaker2
Response: Well , do you think I have to ?

Speaker: speaker1
Response: I do.We haven't watered them for quite a few days .

Speaker: speaker2
Response: Please look at the sky.Don ' t you see the dark clouds ? It's going to rain soon .

Speaker: speaker1
Response: Good.So we don't have to work.How nice !

Speaker: speaker2
Response: But I don't think it's so nice .

Speaker: speaker2
Response: The weather report says it's going to rain for a whole week .

Speaker: speaker1
Response: Oh , I'm afraid all the flowers will die in the rain .
